          "title": "Time Dilation - Einstein's Theory Of Relativity Explained!",
          "description": "Time dilation and Einsteinâ€™s theory of relativity go hand in hand. Albert Einstein is the most popular physicist, as he formulated the theory of relativity, which gave the Energy mass equivalence formula and is directly related to time dilation. But what is time dilation? Time dilation and space time are interrelated. Einstein made one of the most important contributions to physics and had the concept of space time explained. A simple explanation of space time is that it is a mathematical model that fuses the three dimensions of space and the one dimension of time into a single four-dimensional continuum. But it is very important to understand that the general theory of relativity and the special theory of relativity are different. In this short animated video, we give a simple explanation of time dilation and Einsteinâ€™s theory of relativity and also explain how time slows down in a moving vehicle!

          "title": "Dilatasi Waktu - Teori Relativitas Einstein Dijelaskan!",
          "description": "Pelebaran waktu dan teori relativitas Einstein berjalan seiring. Albert Einstein adalah ahli fisika paling populer, ketika ia merumuskan teori relativitas, yang memberikan rumus kesetaraan massa energi dan secara langsung berkaitan dengan pelebaran waktu. Tapi apa itu pelebaran waktu? Pelebaran waktu dan waktu ruang saling terkait. Einstein membuat salah satu kontribusi paling penting untuk fisika dan menjelaskan konsep ruang waktu. Penjelasan sederhana tentang ruang waktu adalah bahwa itu adalah model matematika yang menggabungkan tiga dimensi ruang dan satu dimensi waktu menjadi sebuah kontinum empat dimensi tunggal. Tetapi sangat penting untuk memahami bahwa teori relativitas umum dan teori relativitas khusus berbeda. Dalam video animasi pendek ini, kami memberikan penjelasan sederhana tentang pelebaran waktu dan teori relativitas Einstein dan juga menjelaskan bagaimana waktu melambat dalam kendaraan yang bergerak!

Referensi:

https://faraday.physics.utoronto.ca/PVB/Harrison/GenRel/TimeDilation.html
http://newt.phys.unsw.edu.au/einsteinlight/jw/module4_time_dilation.htm
https://web.pa.msu.edu/courses/2000fall/PHY232/lectures/relativity/dilation.html
http://www.physics.nyu.edu/~ts2/Animation/Time_dilation.html

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcN3IuIAR6Fn74FWMQf6lFA?sub_confirmation=1

Ikuti kami di Twitter! 
https://twitter.com/abc_science

Ikuti kami di Facebook!
https://facebook.com/sciabc

Ikuti Situs Web kami!
https://www.scienceabc.com"
        }
      }
    }

        "title": "Time Dilation - Einstein's Theory Of Relativity Explained!",
        "description": "Time dilation and Einsteinâ€™s theory of relativity go hand in hand. Albert Einstein is the most popular physicist, as he formulated the theory of relativity, which gave the Energy mass equivalence formula and is directly related to time dilation. But what is time dilation? Time dilation and space time are interrelated. Einstein made one of the most important contributions to physics and had the concept of space time explained. A simple explanation of space time is that it is a mathematical model that fuses the three dimensions of space and the one dimension of time into a single four-dimensional continuum. But it is very important to understand that the general theory of relativity and the special theory of relativity are different. In this short animated video, we give a simple explanation of time dilation and Einsteinâ€™s theory of relativity and also explain how time slows down in a moving vehicle!


#science #animation #timedilation #TheoryofRelativity

          "description": "Tijddilatatie en Einsteins relativiteitstheorie gaan hand in hand. Albert Einstein is de meest populaire natuurkundige, omdat hij de relativiteitstheorie formuleerde, die de formule voor energiemassa-equivalentie gaf en direct gerelateerd is aan tijdsdilatatie. Maar wat is tijddilatatie? Tijdsdilatatie en ruimtetijd zijn met elkaar verbonden. Einstein leverde een van de belangrijkste bijdragen aan de natuurkunde en liet het concept van ruimtetijd uitleggen. Een eenvoudige verklaring van ruimtetijd is dat het een wiskundig model is dat de drie dimensies van ruimte en de ene dimensie van tijd samensmelt tot een enkel vierdimensionaal continuÃ¼m. Maar het is heel belangrijk om te begrijpen dat de algemene relativiteitstheorie en de speciale relativiteitstheorie verschillend zijn. In deze korte animatievideo geven we een eenvoudige uitleg van tijdsvertraging en Einsteins relativiteitstheorie en leggen we ook uit hoe de tijd vertraagt in een bewegend voertuig!

        "en": {
          "title": "Time Dilation - Einstein's Theory Of Relativity Explained!",
          "description": "Time dilation and Einsteinâ€™s theory of relativity go hand in hand. Albert Einstein is the most popular physicist, as he formulated the theory of relativity, which gave the Energy mass equivalence formula and is directly related to time dilation. But what is time dilation? Time dilation and space time are interrelated. Einstein made one of the most important contributions to physics and had the concept of space time explained. A simple explanation of space time is that it is a mathematical model that fuses the three dimensions of space and the one dimension of time into a single four-dimensional continuum. But it is very important to understand that the general theory of relativity and the special theory of relativity are different. In this short animated video, we give a simple explanation of time dilation and Einsteinâ€™s theory of relativity and also explain how time slows down in a moving vehicle!
